comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached design file as XLS PROTOTYPE.

Build number:
2.2.0 M6 Release build

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the attached design file as XLS PROTOTYPE.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

could you please attach your env or a runable report which can cause this bug?
You can use nightly build from the following link: http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/build.php?build=N-R1-2.2.0-N20070412-200704120630, and change the attached file to .rptdesign file.

Created an attachment (id=63997)
report use the csv file

Update design file

I found the datasource used in your attach report is from a mysql database.

How do I reproduce your bug? 

Could you please give me more detail steps and the instruction for setup the report env?

thanks in advance.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Save Client.csv and Employee.csv, open the second design file, double click the data source, modify the folder to where you save the two csv file, save.
2. Preview the attached design file as XLS PROTOTYPE.
modified the logic to set the left width as the last column
